hero.quote: No one will help you when you're down, except yourself.
hero.title: Hi, I'm Satria Yudha Purnomo
hero.description: I'm a Tech Generalist with a passion for web development, mobile development, and IoT. I enjoy exploring new technologies and believe that technology can make the world a better place.

about.description: Hi, I'm Satria Yudha Purnomo, a Tech Generalist specializing in web development, mobile development, and IoT. I believe that good design and functionality are key to creating successful products. I'm always eager to learn new technologies and apply them to my projects.
